import Layout from "../components/Layout/Layout.component"; import ResourceCard from "../components/RecourceCard/ResourceCard.component"; import styles from "../pageStyles/resources.module.scss"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import dbConnect from "../utils/dbConnect"; const Resources = (data) => { const [financialGroup, setFinancialGroup] = useState({ pandemicImpact: false, industryProfessional: false, incomeMin: false, }); const [roleGroup, setRoleGroup] = useState({ musician: false, engineer: false, business: false, educator: false, }); const [years, setYears] = useState("1"); const [filters, setFilers] = useState(""); const [sort, setSort] = useState(""); const resourceCriteria = { ...financialGroup, ...roleGroup, years, filters, sort, }; const [resources, setResources] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { console.log(data); }); return (

Are you a musician that has been affected by the COVID-19 Pandemic?

We’ve built a clear and valuable toolkit of Support Resources available to Austin musicians and industry.

Select what you can provide and/or is true for you…

Musician

Engineer/Crew

Business

Educator

Would you like to see?

SORT:

A-Z

Z-A

$

{resources.map((resource) => { return ( ); })} {/* */}
); }; export async function getStaticProps() { dbConnect(); const data = [ { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db662f", "Resource #": "6", "Organization Title": "Artist Relief Tree", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "Closed- Waitlist", "Current US Resident/Country": "", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "Flat- US$250 on a first-come-first-serve basis.", "Are You Considered A:": "Anyone who is an artist (of any kind) can request funds. ", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": " Just upload a resume or point us to your website.", "Org Membership": "", "Proof Of Lost Income": "", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": "", "Other Request": "The only requirement is that you share this fundraiser and provide a simple screenshot showing this.", NOTES: "We trust you: if you’re asking for help, we want to help you. As of April 19, 2020, we have received over 3,500 requests for funds from artists around the world and have a waitlist of over 12,000 more.", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db6630", "Resource #": "7", "Organization Title": "Arts Administrators Of Color", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "Open", "Current US Resident/Country": "US-based", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "", Race: "Black, Indeginous, People Of Color ONLY", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "This is a ONE-TIME micro grant of $200.", "Are You Considered A:": "", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "", "Org Membership": "BIPOC artists and administrators- Members Only", "Proof Of Lost Income": "", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": "", "Other Request": "", NOTES: "", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db663b", "Resource #": "18", "Organization Title": "International Bluegrass Music Association", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "", "Current US Resident/Country": "", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "awarding grants of up to $500 per eligible applicant.", "Are You Considered A:": "Artist; Composers; Musician; Broadcaster; Media Representatives; Event Producers; Agents; Educators; Manager; Employee of Record Company; Luthiers; Merchandisers", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "5 Years ", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "Bluegrass", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "provide information regarding your career: biographical information, articles, discographies,\nphotos, etc.", "Org Membership": "Not required for assistance", "Proof Of Lost Income": "", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "50% Or More", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "Disclose current financial situation: assests/liabilites; Statement of Income; Projected Monthly Expenses", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": "emergency need is any unforeseen circumstance that has prevented the applicant from being able to pay for basic living expenses such as housing, transportation, groceries and medical/dental expenses", "Other Request": "", NOTES: "", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db662a", "Resource #": "1", "Organization Title": "ACM Lifting Lives", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "Paused- Waitlist", "Current US Resident/Country": "", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "", "Are You Considered A:": "", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "2 Years", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "Country", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "", "Org Membership": "Academy Of Country Music (ACM)", "Proof Of Lost Income": 'Proof of loss of income (laid-off, cancelled bookings, etc.)"', "Primary Source Of Income? ": "", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": "", "Other Request": "", NOTES: "Either 2 years industry or member of AGM + Proof Of Loss", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db6640", "Resource #": "23", "Organization Title": "Patreon Fund", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "Closed- Round One", "Current US Resident/Country": "", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "", "Are You Considered A:": "", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "", "Org Membership": "", "Proof Of Lost Income": "", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": "", "Other Request": "", NOTES: "", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db6635", "Resource #": "12", "Organization Title": "Equal Sound", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "Open", "Current US Resident/Country": "", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "", "Are You Considered A:": "Be a human and a musician", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "Upload your W9 (see the above paragraphs about security); Upload evidence that you had this gig confirmed and then canceled IN A SINGLE PDF (see below)", "Org Membership": "", "Proof Of Lost Income": "", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": "", "Other Request": "", NOTES: "Please wait until you've received a payment to apply for another canceled gig.", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db662b", "Resource #": "2", "Organization Title": "The Actors Fund", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "Open", "Current US Resident/Country": "", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "", "Are You Considered A:": "", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "5 Years", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "", "Org Membership": "", "Proof Of Lost Income": "", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "Over $6,500/Year for 5 years", "Financial Documents Required": "Five years of earnings. Accepted forms of earnings documentation include: Union Pension and Health statements, W-2 or 1099 forms. Do not include income tax forms without W-2's .\nMost recent checking and savings bank statement, including name, address and balance totals.\nCurrent lease, rent or mortgage statement. If none of these are available, another household bill with your name and address.", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": "", "Other Request": "", NOTES: "you must have entertainment industry earnings over $6,500 for three out of the last five years. Income from teaching does not qualify. Dancers, comedians and comedy professionals must document three years of recent earnings of at least $2,000 a year.", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db6633", "Resource #": "10", "Organization Title": "The Creator Fund", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "Closed", "Current US Resident/Country": "", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "Apply to receive financial assistance up to $500", "Are You Considered A:": "", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "", "Org Membership": "", "Proof Of Lost Income": "", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": "", "Other Request": "", NOTES: "", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db6645", "Resource #": "28", "Organization Title": "Sweet Relief", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "", "Current US Resident/Country": "", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "55+= no medical condition required; Under 55= must have recent serious medical condition", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "", "Are You Considered A:": "Vocalist; Singer; Songwriter; Composer; Arranger; Instrumentalist; Musician; artist managers; tour managers; and crew workers; booking agents; producers; recording engineers; music teachers; publicists", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": " bio, discography, newspaper\nclippings, sheet music, records, contracts, guild/union membership card, dues notice, or\nverification from other members of the music industry. regular public performances OR performed on at least three widely released recordings (audio or audiovisual), or written music that has been performed on three widely released recordings, or published on three occasions.", "Org Membership": "", "Proof Of Lost Income": "Proof of cancellations and bookings ", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "50% of income + from Music Industry", "Gross Annual Income": "Requested", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "Financal Assests, Liabilities, & Monthly Budget; tax returns, bank statements, and/or any other information deemed necessary to verify", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "relevant medical documentation if requesting medical support (under 55); medical bills; insurance company", "Proof Of Emergency": "A diagnosis by a medical doctor, or hospital or medical bills indicating such condition, must be provided.", "Crises Type?": "", "Other Request": "", NOTES: "Any individual who does not meet these criteria, but believes he or she to be eligible for assistance may request an application for a grant by providing a written explanation as to why the Grant Committee should make an exception to the above policies.", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db6637", "Resource #": "14", "Organization Title": "Foundation For Contemporary Arts", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "", "Current US Resident/Country": "", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "", "Are You Considered A:": "individual artists, or an individual representing an artist collective, ensemble, or group.Currently, this fund cannot support performers, ensemble members, or designers who were working on a project that was canceled; we recognize the vital contributions that performers, artist assistants, designers, and others make to the field and have listed other resources that offer more targeted support to those artists below.", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "work of a contemporary, experimental nature. If you are unsure about whether your work is experimental, you can see other artists we have supported on our Instagram and our website.", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "", "Org Membership": "", "Proof Of Lost Income": "Relief will be provided to artists who can demonstrate that they have had an engagement canceled or postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic.", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": " have a U.S. Tax ID Number (SSN, EIN, ITIN, or other)", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": "", "Other Request": "", NOTES: 'For the purpose of providing COVID-19 relief, we are temporarily suspending the three year waiting period between grants. If you have received a grant from the Foundation in the past three years you may apply for COVID-19 relief."', "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db663d", "Resource #": "20", "Organization Title": "Music Health Alliance", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "", "Current US Resident/Country": "", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "", "Are You Considered A:": "Music Industry Employment", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "3 Years", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "articles, liner notes, letters from employers, biography, resume, or discography", "Org Membership": "", "Proof Of Lost Income": "copy of your contract, flyers or links to event sites listing your involvement in the canceled event or letter or email from employer identifying cancellation, etc. ", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "Income/Financial Status Applicants must provide most recent bank statement. Printouts from your ATM or screen shots of your account will not be accepted. ", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "If you are requesting assistance for health insurance premiums, please submit a copy of your health insurance monthly premium documentation from your health insurance company.", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": "document loss of income from the tornado or COVID-19 ", "Other Request": "", NOTES: "", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db663e", "Resource #": "21", "Organization Title": "Musicans Foundation", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "Closed", "Current US Resident/Country": "United States", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "give grants for medical and allied living expenses in emergencies, and pay these debts on behalf of the musicians we help. We do not write checks directly to musicians. Our grants typically range in amount from approximately $500-$3000.", "Are You Considered A:": "Musician", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "5 Years", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "Any Genre", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "", "Org Membership": "", "Proof Of Lost Income": "", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "Yes, for 5 years", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "provide tax documentation detailing that for five (5) or more years, your principal income has been derived from your work as a musician.", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": " acute need, due to personal, medical, dental, or family crisis, natural disaster, or other emergency situation. We also aid musicians who need assistance supporting their family members in times of emergency.", "Other Request": "", NOTES: "", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db6646", "Resource #": "29", "Organization Title": "Red River Cultural Fund", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "", "Current US Resident/Country": "Austin & Surrounding Areas- USA", City: "Austin", State: "TX", Birthdate: "", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "", "Are You Considered A:": "Bar Staff;\nServer\nKitchen/BOH\nProduction (Audio/Visual)\nProduction (Managers/Buyers/Office Staff)\nTicket Booth\nSecurity\nContent Creation (Photog/Marketing/etc)\nMusician\nOther...", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ", "Are You Considered A:": " Artist; Writers; Musician; Business Professional", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "10 Years", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "Gospel; Christian ", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "", "Org Membership": "", "Proof Of Lost Income": "", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "Full-Time", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": "", "Other Request": "Can request help for dependents/children", NOTES: "", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db663f", "Resource #": "22", "Organization Title": "PEAR Fund- Passim Emergency Artist Relief Fund", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "", "Current US Resident/Country": "", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "", "Are You Considered A:": "Artist; Musician", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "", "Org Membership": "Artists must have performed a show for Passim or taught at the School of Music in the last 10 years. This includes shows in the club, live music brunches, outdoor events & series booked by Passim, classes, and workshops in the School.", "Proof Of Lost Income": "links to venue sites, Facebook events, social media posts, etc, where possible to show cancellations.", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": "Artists must have lost income as a result of cancellations due to the COVID-19 crisis. This includes shows, tours, and teaching opportunities.", "Other Request": "Artists must agree to participate in Passim's virtual music festival, Keep Your Distance Fest. Artists will record a video of themselves performing a song, upload it to their Youtube, and link to passim.org/PEARfund to help raise awareness & funds for the PEAR fund. Passim will add it to our Keep Your Distance playlist.", NOTES: "", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db6648", "Resource #": "31", "Organization Title": "Group Muse", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "Closed", "Current US Resident/Country": "", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "", "Are You Considered A:": "Musician", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "", "Org Membership": "", "Proof Of Lost Income": "", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": "", "Other Request": "", NOTES: "", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db664b", "Resource #": "34", "Organization Title": "Home Austin", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "", "Current US Resident/Country": "USA- Within 50 miles of Austin, TX", City: "Austin", State: "TX", Birthdate: "Must be 55", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "", "Are You Considered A:": "Musician", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "20 years", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "link to your website, recordings, press or the name and contact information of a music industry reference.", "Org Membership": "", "Proof Of Lost Income": "", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": "", "Other Request": "", NOTES: "", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db6636", "Resource #": "13", "Organization Title": "Facebook For Business", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "Closed", "Current US Resident/Country": "United States", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "", "Are You Considered A:": "Have between 2 and 50 employees", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "Have been in business for over a year", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "", "Org Membership": "", "Proof Of Lost Income": "", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "Have experienced challenges from COVID-19", "Healthcare Related Issue": "", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": "", "Other Request": "Be in or near a location where Facebook operates", NOTES: "", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db6639", "Resource #": "16", "Organization Title": "Freelancers Union", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "Closed", "Current US Resident/Country": "primarily resides in the United States", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "Freelancers Relief Fund will offer financial assistance of up to $1,000 per freelance household to cover lost income and essential expenses not covered by government relief programs, including:\n\nFood/food supplies\nUtility payments\nCash assistance to cover income loss\n100% of all donations will be distributed directly to freelancers in need.", "Are You Considered A:": "freelancer; Eligible freelance businesses include sole proprietors, limited liability companies, or other entity provided there is no more than one employee.", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "1 Year", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "", "Org Membership": "", "Proof Of Lost Income": "Experience a sudden decrease of at least 50% of income as a direct result of the COVID-19 pandemic, including those experiencing contract cancelations or loss of work due to social distancing measures, experiencing COVID-19 illness or caring for immediate family members infected with COVID-19. ", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "performed freelance work as their primary source of income for at least one year prior to their application.", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "Your application must include a narrative and provide tangible documentation of income loss.\nProvide tangible documentation of freelance income and income loss by providing the following supporting documents:\n2019 tax filings or annualized financial statements\nTwo consecutive months of 2020 financial statements\nCanceled contracts or relevant client communications\nFinancial documents can include: tax returns (including schedule C statements if applicable), bank statements, or CPA-certified profit & loss statements.", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": "", "Healthcare Related Issue": "", "Proof Of Emergency": "", "Crises Type?": "", "Other Request": "", NOTES: "", "OTHER NOTES": "", }, { _id: "5f616a9b012f5c1b21db6647", "Resource #": "30", "Organization Title": "Austin Creative Alliance", "Resource Type": "Grant", "Grants Current Status": "", "Current US Resident/Country": "", City: "", State: "", Birthdate: "", Race: "", Dependents: "", "Acceptable Use Of Funds": "Artists may apply for up to $500 to replace verifiable lost income due to the cancellation of a specific, scheduled gig or opportunity (i.e. commissions, performances, contracts) due to Coronavirus/COVID-19 precautionary measures. ", "Are You Considered A:": "", "How Long Have You Worked In The Industry": "", "What Genre Of Music Do You Play? ": "", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": " link to a website with your artistic work or your CV. ": "", "Proof Of Musicianship/Industry Work": "A resume detailing your serious commitment, history and accomplishments as an artist working in a craft discipline. The resume should list exhibitions and shows; publications featuring your work; awards; education; teaching experiences; and/or any other accomplishments that will help us evaluate your career as an established artist working in a craft discipline. Folk and traditional artists without a resume must provide a statement about the artistic tradition of their practice, how they learned their craft and where they share, sell and/or exhibit their work, if they do. Five high quality photographs of your art created in a craft discipline in the past five years. You will also have the option to provide documents that illustrate your art career, in addition to images of your artwork and resume provided in the inquiry.", "Org Membership": "", "Proof Of Lost Income": "", "Primary Source Of Income? ": "", "Gross Annual Income": "", "Music- Income Amount": "", "Financial Documents Required": "The first two pages of your IRS Form 1040 and, if applicable, the Schedule C for your art business from the last two years (or your Forma Única form if you are a Puerto Rico resident). If you have an art business and it is a corporation, then the first two pages of your IRS Form 1040 and the first two pages of your corporate tax return from the last two years. If your tax returns are not available, you can request that transcripts of your federal Form 1040 tax returns be mailed to you (allow five to ten days to receive them) or you can download them here.", "How Have You Been Affected By COVID?": " CERF+ ‘s emergency relief grants related to Covid-19 will focus on those infected with the virus that require intensive medical care. have experienced a recent, unforeseen emergency or triggering event that has significantly and adversely affected your ability to produce, exhibit and/or market your work and, thus, creates the need for immediate assistance.", "Healthcare Related Issue": " CERF+ ‘s emergency relief grants related to Covid-19 will focus on those infected with the virus that require intensive medical care.", "Proof Of Emergency": "If a medical emergency, provide a written prognosis from your doctor or other health provider.
